mapper.sql: ID,FREQUENCY_ID frequencyId, DEPARTURE, DESTINATION, WAYLINE, DEPARTUREDATETIME, DESTINATIONDATETIME, LICENSEPLATE, LICENSEPLATESTR, DRIVERNAME, CHARTEREDCOMPANY, COMPANYLEADER, LEADERIDNUMBER, LEADERPHONE, PASSENGER, ORDERPASSENGER, CHECKSTATUS, CHECKDATETIME, CHARTEREDPRICE, RELEASEDATETIME, INSPECTOR, COMPANY, OPER_ID, OPER_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into wt_chartered (FREQUENCY_ID,DEPARTURE, DESTINATION, WAYLINE, DEPARTUREDATETIME, DESTINATIONDATETIME, LICENSEPLATE, LICENSEPLATESTR, DRIVERNAME, CHARTEREDCOMPANY, COMPANYLEADER, LEADERIDNUMBER, LEADERPHONE, PASSENGER, ORDERPASSENGER, CHECKSTATUS, CHECKDATETIME, CHARTEREDPRICE, RELEASEDATETIME, INSPECTOR, COMPANY, OPER_ID, OPER_TIME) values (#{frequencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wayline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departuredatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{destinationdatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{licenseplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseplatestr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drivername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{charteredcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyleader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaderidnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaderphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passenger,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderpassenger,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checkstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checkdatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{charteredprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, now(), #{inspector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now())
mapper.update:
update wt_chartered
FREQUENCY_ID = #{frequencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTURE = #{departure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESTINATION = #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAYLINE = #{wayline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTUREDATETIME = #{departuredatetime,jdbcType=DATE},
DESTINATIONDATETIME = #{destinationdatetime,jdbcType=DATE},
LICENSEPLATE = #{licenseplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENSEPLATESTR = #{licenseplatestr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRIVERNAME = #{drivername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARTEREDCOMPANY = #{charteredcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANYLEADER = #{companyleader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEADERIDNUMBER = #{leaderidnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEADERPHONE = #{leaderphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSENGER = #{passenger,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORDERPASSENGER = #{orderpassenger,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHECKSTATUS = #{checkstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHECKDATETIME = #{checkdatetime,jdbcType=DATE},
CHARTEREDPRICE = #{charteredprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RELEASEDATETIME = #{releasedatetime,jdbcType=DATE},
INSPECTOR = #{inspector,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_ID = #{operId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_TIME = now(),
where ID = #{charteredId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update wt_chartered set FREQUENCY_ID = #{frequencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTURE = #{departure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESTINATION = #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAYLINE = #{wayline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTUREDATETIME = #{departuredatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, DESTINATIONDATETIME = #{destinationdatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, LICENSEPLATE = #{licenseplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENSEPLATESTR = #{licenseplatestr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRIVERNAME = #{drivername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARTEREDCOMPANY = #{charteredcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYLEADER = #{companyleader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEADERIDNUMBER = #{leaderidnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEADERPHONE = #{leaderphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSENGER = #{passenger,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDERPASSENGER = #{orderpassenger,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHECKSTATUS = #{checkstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHECKDATETIME = #{checkdatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, CHARTEREDPRICE = #{charteredprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RELEASEDATETIME = #{releasedatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, INSPECTOR = #{inspector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_ID = #{operId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_TIME = now() where ID = #{charteredId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select , (case CHECKSTATUS when 0 then '待安检' when -1 then '未通过' when 1 then '已通过' END) checkstatusName ,ID charteredId from wt_chartered
